security.opt1: No more than 2 identical characters in a row
security.opt3: Lower case (a-z), upper case (A-Z) and numbers (0-9)

pricing.title: Our prices
pricing.trialAdvice: If you consider it necessary to try the service for a period longer than 5 days, you can request it from the contact form

footer.description: When you visit or interact with our sites, services or tools, we or our authorised service providers may use cookies for storing information to help provide you with a better, faster and safer experience and for marketing purposes.

ApiDocs.faqSubtitle: Search our FAQ for answers to anything you might ask.

FAQ.title1: Can I make mass mailings via the Chat API?
FAQ.subtitle1: We encourage our customers not to send unwanted messages and not to make bulk marketing messages. Otherwise your account can be blocked by the WhatsApp anti-spam system. Do not send more than 6000 messages per day from one number. Or no more than 5-10 messages per minute. Exceeding this threshold may attract the attention of WhatsApp algorithms. To send more messages, connect another number
FAQ.title2: I need to send more than 6,000 messages a day. What to do?
FAQ.subtitle2: Use multiple accounts. Multiple numbers of WhatsApp allow you to send more messages per day. If you use more than 5 accounts, we provide a discount. Accounts are added on request to technical support.
FAQ.title3: Can I send images, audio and video files?
FAQ.subtitle3: Yes, you can. Important! Use the / sendFile method instead of the message (sendMessage) method in the link to the token. Send only https links (do not send http). The maximum file size is 60 mb. It is better to send large files with a link, not base64.
FAQ.title4: How do I send a message to the WhatsApp group?
FAQ.subtitle4_1: Create a group using the POST / group method.
FAQ.subtitle4_2: Get chatid through the GET / messages method.
FAQ.subtitle4_3: Send a message to the group via POST / sendMessage.
FAQ.title5: Will Chat API be updated when I update WhatsApp?
FAQ.subtitle5: Yes, it will be updated. Chat API has been working and supported since December 2015. Usually there are 3 - 4 updates per year, affecting the work of the Chat API. Within 1 working day, we adapt the API to the changes.
FAQ.title6: Is the status 'Delivered' and 'Read' displayed when sent via the Chat API?
FAQ.subtitle6: Yes. See the section 'ack' in the documentation
FAQ.title7: How to connect WhatsApp to Chat API?
FAQ.subtitle7_1: How to connect WhatsApp to Chat-Api
FAQ.subtitle7_2: Connect the phone number to the service.
FAQ.subtitle7_3_1: Create your Chat-Api account. It's free!
FAQ.subtitle7_3_2: After that you will be redirected to the admin panel where your personal instance (account) will be created. You will receive a QR code on the main page of your personal account. Pay attention to secure authorization for new phones. Now, following the instructions, open WhatsApp on your mobile phone, go to «Settings» - > WhatsApp Web - > Scan QR code
FAQ.subtitle7_4_1: What do you need to get started?
FAQ.subtitle7_4_2: A mobile phone with WhatsApp running is required for normal operation. Most of the time, our customers simply plug an unused WhatsApp device into the power grid and do not use it for any other purpose It is important to observe the conditions for correct functioning of the bots: - The WhatsApp app is running on your device (not in power saving mode), connected to the internet and has a good battery life. - Do not use Whatsapp Web! Please do not sign in to the WhatsApp web version after you have connected your number to your personal account, this will result in a connection reset and you will have to go through the connection procedure again. In case of violation of any of these conditions, the messages will stop reaching your personal cabinet and will not be sent.
FAQ.title8: What do you need to get started?
FAQ.subtitle8_1: What do you need to get started?
FAQ.subtitle8_2: A mobile phone with WhatsApp running is required for normal operation.
FAQ.subtitle8_3: Most of the time, our customers simply plug an unused WhatsApp device into the power grid and do not use it for any other purpose
FAQ.subtitle8_4: It is important to observe the conditions for correct functioning of the bots:
FAQ.subtitle8_5: - The WhatsApp app is running on your device (not in power saving mode), connected to the internet and has a good battery life.
FAQ.subtitle8_7: Please do not sign in to the WhatsApp web version after you have connected your number to your personal account, this will result in a connection reset and you will have to go through the connection procedure again.
FAQ.subtitle8_8: In case of violation of any of these conditions, the messages will stop reaching your personal cabinet and will not be sent.
FAQ.subtitle9_2: The main reason WhatsApp can block a number is because of user complaints about spam. Just a few clicks on the 'This is spam' button after you send your messages. You will not be able to unlock your phone number. You will not be able to get your customers' answers. You will lose your subscriber base and you will have to activate a new phone number (we do not charge you any additional fees).
FAQ.subtitle9_3: If you are banned, please contact our technical support team.
FAQ.subtitle9_6: - Set up the advertising in such a way that the user is the first to write to you (the 'Mark as Spam' button does not appear).
FAQ.subtitle9_7: - Send messages only to your loyal database of numbers that have given you their consent.
FAQ.subtitle9_8: - Don't send the same messages, change them: personalize the messages (“Hi, %name%”).
FAQ.subtitle9_9: - Take advantage of the opportunity to subscribe and unsubscribe from your mailing list in each message. To do this, add reply buttons (e.g. 'Write 0 to unsubscribe')
FAQ.subtitle9_10: - Minimize the presence of a link in messages at first use of the bot
FAQ.subtitle9_11: - Offer users to save your contact
FAQ.subtitle9_13: - New phone numbers have a greater risk of being blocked. Before connecting a completely new number, we advise you to use Whatsapp personally for some time (chat with other numbers so that you have a variety of incoming and outgoing messages from different numbers)
FAQ.subtitle9_14: - Use secure authentication in your personal account
FAQ.subtitle9_15: - When you start using the bot, send no more than 5-10 messages per minute, i.e. send messages in batches, not all at once. The longer your bot works, the more messages you can send.
FAQ.subtitle9_16: - Do not use numbers and devices(!) that have already been blocked by WhatsApp.

home.title: Unified communications
home.subtitle: The best solutions for your company
home.descriptionText: Using our API, you can send and receive messages through WhatsApp in minutes. You can create your own bot by sending automatic responses when people type in their numbers. Or just send notifications to all your customers.
home.descriptionAdviceSubtitle: We urge our customers not to send unsolicited messages. However, you are not technically limited and can do so. But remember, your account may be suspended by WhatsApp if users click the "it's spam" button multiple times.

benefits.wspRestApiSubtitle: Our REST API was designed to be extremely easy to use and accessible to everyone, no matter the programing language or frameworks you use. Check out the API documentation to learn more.
benefits.textLocationMultimediaSubtitle: We support text, location and media messages (images, audio, video or documents).
benefits.groupMessagesSubtitle: You can send text or media messages to multiple chat groups for marketing announcements or offers. You can also create groups.
benefits.technicalSupportSubtitle: Fast and friendly technical support will always help you solve or fix problems.
benefits.webhookSubtitle: Create your custom Webhook to get notified when your message have been received or on contact status updates.
benefits.worksEverywhereSubtitle: Any country, any phone number. The only thing you need is a mobile device with WhatsApp installed. We will take care of the rest.
benefits.title: Modules
benefits.descriptionTriiTeam: Create discussion rooms for certain topics. It maintains the communicated sectors.
benefits.descriptionTriiChat: Assign conversations to different users. History and contact details in one place.
benefits.descriptionTriiMarketing: Communicate news, promotions and notifications. Generate new sales.
benefits.descriptionTriiTicket: Follow up on orders, claims, queries and among others. Notifications with WhatsApp.
benefits.descriptionTriiService: Coordinate service groups. Send status change notifications.
benefits.descriptionTriiCollections: Strengthen the relationship with your customers. Facilitates collection.
benefits.descriptionTriiCalls: Integrate audio communications through our IVR and/or SIP softphone.
benefits.descriptionTriiContacts: Manage all your contacts in an organized way.

firstStep.subtitle: Enter the exact domain name you want people to see when they visit this space. It shoud be a subdomain (portal.yourdomain.com)

secondStep.title: Create a CNAME DNS Record
secondStep.subtitle: To complete the setup of your custom domain, add a CNAME record to your domain by visiting your DNS provider or registrar.

functionsHomeView.title: Functions
functionsHomeView.multiChannelSubtitle: We unify all the messaging channels available in your company. Telephony, SMS, Web Chat, Email, Facebook, WhatsApp and Instagram.
functionsHomeView.botsSubtitle: Our Chatbot allows you to automate from simple welcome messages to complex option trees. Applies to WhatsApp, SMS, Web Chat, E-mail and Facebook channels.
functionsHomeView.apiSubtitle: We allow customers through their management systems to send automatic notices by email, SMS, WhatsApp or phone call.
functionsHomeView.dashboardSubtitle: View important information in real time, taking control of your business and anticipating possible actions to improve productivity.
functionsHomeView.reportsSubtitle: Know in detail the development of your company's communications.
functionsHomeView.ivrSubtitle: We automate customer phone calls by combining the database, PBX and the Trii module.

success.verifyAccount: Your account has been verified successfully

aboutUs.name: About us
aboutUs.titlePartTwo: get the most out of your business.
aboutUs.subtitle: Trii is an omnichannel platform that will allow you to centralize the different communication channels, strengthen the relationship with your customers and improve the performance of your company through its different modules.
